root.name: Rocky & Bullwinkle
root.description: Rocky and Bullwinkle is a game that utalizes a gene of gaming first popularized by the Wario Ware games. In Rocky and Bullwinkle, you play through a large amount of "Micro-games" that test the players hand-eye cordination and speed. The game features over 100 of these Micro-Games that last anywhere from 2 seconds, to 10 seconds. If you're a fan of the original television series, you'll be glad to know that many of the characters from the original are featured in this game, including Rocky andÂ Bullwinkle, Boris and Natasha, Dudley Do-Right, and many more. Each Character, his his own "show" in the game, and each show has its own unique assortment of video games. And Xbox Live Vision Camera owners will be glad to know that they have the ability to play 25 of the games using the Camera, which only enhances the challenge. The developer, Zen Studios, has ensured that this classic T.V. series will live on and will be enjoyed by many people too young to remember the television series.
